text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's a few days before the<n>academy's tryouts, an event
where<n>students can demonstrate their skills<n>to trainers.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I head over to the track to see how<n>the racers are doing
today.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Well, I'm outta here. Catch ya guys<n>later.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Wait, Vodka?! Where do you think<n>you're going?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Ugh, she's such a wannabe<n>delinquent!

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text:
I'm concerned for her... I know she's<n>got the talent, but
tryouts are coming<n>up. Will she be okay?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Oh uh, you don't need to worry about<n>her performance.
She'll be just fine.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Why don't we just go ahead and<n>start practicing? The
other students<n>are waiting for your directions.

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text:
You're right. Well then, let's get<n>started, shall we? We'll
begin with a<n>2000-meter jog.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite the upcoming tryouts, Vodka<n>seems to be
boycotting practice today.
choice_data_list: She doesn't strike me as lazy, though...
She doesn't strike me as lazy, though...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Curious, I follow her to figure out<n>why.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Hmph. "Until you all find a trainer,<n>you'll be following the
instructors'<n>training regimen!"

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: As if I have time for that generic crap!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I'm gonna do things my own way!
choice_data_list: Are you going to train by yourself?
Are you going to train by yourself?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh? Who are... Oh, you're one of the<n>academy's trainers.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, got a problem? I'm a lone wolf,<n>and that means I
don't mingle.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Besides, the teacher's plans are<n>waaaay too chill for me.
My body'll<n>get weaker at that rate.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Anyway, we're done, right? I'm<n>gonna go do my thing now.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Vodka bluntly ends the conversation<n>and walks off. I hang
around for a bit<n>more, observing her training.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Pheeeew! Now that's what I'm<n>talkin' 'bout!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: But I'm just gettin' started!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even though she's overloading in<n>certain aspects of her
training and<n>neglecting others, she's still going<n>strong in
her own way.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh, still here? Damn, you must have<n>nothin' better to do.
choice_data_list: So you really weren't trying to skip training.
So you really weren't trying to skip training.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: What? Me? Skip training? Do I look<n>that lame?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Listen up, I'm gonna be the coolest<n>racer in the Twinkle
Series, the kind<n>who leaves everyone in the dust!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: If I do the same as everyoneelse, then I'll be the same aseveryone else.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
It's just like gettin' buried in the<n>middle of the pack. You
get stuck in<n>there with no way out.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna train harder—so I can be<n>faster than everyone
else! I'm not<n>gonna get stuck behind anyone!
choice_data_list:
Is that why you made your own training
regimen?

Is that why you made your own training
regimen?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Yep. Got a problem?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Although boycotting her teacher's<n>regimen and creating her
own<n>haphazard one isn't the best course<n>of action, she's
got guts.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: H-hey, whatcha doin' starin' at me<n>like that?
choice_data_list: Oh, I was just thinking that you're pretty cool.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Coo—?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: A-ahem! Sorry, can ya say that<n>again? I couldn't hear ya!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Ya said somethin' 'bout me right?<n>C'mon, say it one more
time!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Hey, what's with that weak answer?<n>Put some oomph into
it!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: What did ya call me?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hehehe! You've got a good eye for<n>things!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna keep training... but you can<n>stick around for as
long as ya want!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Because I'm so cool and generous!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: All right, I'm pumped! Let's up those<n>reps!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I watch her train with even more<n>gusto, I can't help but
grin.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few days later, tryouts officially<n>begin and Vodka makes
her<n>appearance.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Graaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Ngh!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Vodka is pushing ahead! Vodka is<n>pushing ahead! Daiwa
Scarlet is<n>fighting with all her might...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
But the gap is too big! Vodka finishes<n>in first, Daiwa Scarlet
in second!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Your running's a bit rough around the<n>edges, but you've
got great potential,<n>Vodka! Why don't you come and join<n>
me?

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
No, come join me instead! I've<n>amassed plenty of data on
the racers<n>I've trained in the past. I'll be able to<n>design a
training program specifically<n>for—

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Sorry, but I'm not interested that<n>kinda thing.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Vodka's performance pulls in many<n>scouting offers, but
none seem to<n>land.
choice_data_list: (If I recall, what she really wants to hear is...)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's you from the other day! Hehe,<n>whatd'ya think about
my racing?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: For real?! Yes!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Hey hey, you're not training anyone<n>yet, right? How 'bout
joining forces<n>with me?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hell yeah! Looking forward to<n>workin' with ya, Trainer!
